string.value: If I need #b#t4031462##k, I should go see #b#p2051001##k in #m221000000#.

Among the ingredients for #b#t2280001##k that #p2012017# gave me, I came here because I was told to ask b#p2051001##k for #b#t4031462##k....but Kay says he's also busy and wants me to get ingredients: He needs #b100 #t4000103# and 1 #t4011001##k. Sure is a lot of stuff...

#i4000103##t4000103# #b#c4000103# / 100#k
#i4011001##t4011001# #b#c4011001# / 1
I gave #t4000103# and #t4011001# and got #t4031462#. One step closer to the end...
어이, 안녕? 이 지하까지 오는 사람은 그리 많지 않은데. 왠일이야?
휴즈? 휴즈라면 오르비스의 휴즈 아저씨 말이야? 그 아저씨가 환기 팬을 만들어 달라고 했다고? 환기 팬이라... 흐음. 지구방위본부 일도 많은데 곤란한걸? 지구방위본부에 환기 팬은 많지만, 그건 줄 수 없어. 수고스럽겠지만 네가 그 재료를 구해오면 환기 팬을 만들어 주도록 할게. 부탁해.
역시 귀찮은 모양이지? 미안하지만 그렇다면 환기 팬은 줄 수 없어.
Hey, hello? A few people come down to the basement here. What brought you here?

Hugh? You mean uncle Hugh of Orbis? Did he ask to make a ventilation fan? Ventilation fan...Hmm. I'm busy with Earth Defense HQ. We have many ventilation fans, but I can't give them out. I'm sorry but if you gather ingredients, I can make one for you.
I need #b 100 plane propellers#k and #bsteel#k for one ventilation fan. Get them and return to me!
Can't be bothered? Sorry, but I can't give just give them to you!
You gathered everything. You look busy, so I'll just give you the fan in Earth defense HQ. I can make one with the materials you bought. That should save you a bit of time!
What kind of research is uncle Hugh doing?
Hmm. You haven't gathered them all? Try a bit harder--I'll be waiting!
